1253090.name: Crucible - Tracker Founder's Pack
1253090.description:
The Tracker Founder’s Pack bundles up an exclusive epic skin for Captain Mendoza, 500 in-game Credits, the Pre-Season Battle Pass, and 100 battle stars—enough to instantly unlock 10 levels of rewards!

  • 500 Credits

    500 Credits for use in the in-game store ($5.00 Value)

  • Pre-Season Battle Pass

    The Pre-Season Battle Pass opens up 80 levels of rewards—from voice lines and character skins to experience boosts and Credits. From now until July 13, you can complete challenges to earn battle stars and unlock rewards! The level 80 reward is a Battle Pass Key, which will let you pick one of several legendary character skins! The Battle Pass Key is the only way to get your hands on these skins, so keep your eyes on the prize.

  • 100 Battle Stars

    Earning battle stars unlocks rewards on the battle pass. With the Tracker Founder's Pack, you'll be able to instantly unlock the first 10 levels of rewards.

  • Exclusive Epic Skin for Captain Mendoza

    Get Captain Mendoza's epic "Diplomat" skin when you buy any of the Founder's Packs.

Tracker Founder's Pack purchases are non-refundable. Only one Tracker Founder's Pack may be applied to a single account. If you purchase multiple tiers of the Founder's Pack (e.g., a Tracker Founder's Pack and an Alpha Hunter Founder's Pack) you'll receive the Credits and battle stars from each bundle, but only one of any duplicate non-stacking items (e.g., you will not receive a second "Diplomat" skin for Captain Mendoza).
1253090.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
